name: Cisco | IOSXR | Environment | Temperature Out of Range #2 (SYSLOG)
description: %PLATFORM-ENVMON-2-CHASSIS_OVERTEMP : Chassis ambient temperature 56.0C at or above rising T3 threshold 56.0C
